name: profanely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows no respect for a god or a religion, often through using language that is offensive or rude : One guy got so offended that he jumped up, yelled profanely, and walked out. She is married to a former police officer, whose language is cheerfully and profanely strong.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was overheard criticizing his boss loudly and profanely to a couple of visitors. Each runner was cheered on profanely by the onlookers.No one can solve these problems without profanely trying to act as a judge between God and men.
